title: This is fine. Everything’s fine.
description: Katie and Ashley discuss what the last week has been like and what the future holds for the pod (3:52). Then it’s business as usual: Nick Chubb makes bettors and fantasy owners upset, Matt Patricia doesn’t like fun, and the Pope is making news on IG (52:59). Dustin Johnson won the Masters and Katie realized something VERY important (1:11:12); the Marlins got a new GM (1:15:22) - and it’s a lady! The NHL unveils their retro reverse jerseys (1:27:50) and an Alka Seltzer commercial divides the crew (1:44:10). Finally, a very important wedding invitation (1:54:51)
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and Ashley talk fun stuff and not so fun stuff.
